116  class RandomWalkModel : public StochasticModel

123  : qprime(90000000000.0), previousTime(CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME),
124  currentTime(CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME) {};
125 
126 
139  RandomWalkModel( double qp,
140  const CommonTime& prevTime=CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME,
141  const CommonTime& currentTime=CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME )
142  : qprime(qp), previousTime(prevTime), currentTime(prevTime) {};

233  class WhiteNoiseModel : public StochasticModel
234  {
